definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Both areas have front access with pivoting doors, and are accessed via glass doors.
sentences.chinese: 两个区域都有带旋转门的正面通道，通过玻璃门出入。

sentences.english: Perhaps in a revolving door ever being face to face.
sentences.chinese: 在旋转门面对面的那一刹。

sentences.english: The revolving door between Washington and Wall Street needs to be jammed.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿与华尔街之间的旋转门亦需被堵住。

sentences.english: George went back through the swinging door into the kitchen and untied Nick and the cook.
sentences.chinese: 乔治从转门走进厨房，把尼克跟厨子两个人松开了绑。

sentences.english: I'd like to ask them whether they remember, perhaps in a revolving door ever being face to face.
sentences.chinese: 我想问他们是否记得，在旋转门面对面的那一刹。

sentences.english: A swinging door hit me and I really saw stars.
sentences.chinese: 一扇旋转门撞得我两眼冒金星。

sentences.english: That's the so-called revolving door issue.
sentences.chinese: 这就是所谓的旋转门的问题。

sentences.english: Passing through the turnstile is another line that marks a transition back to the locked node.
sentences.chinese: 通过旋转门则是另一线条，代表转变回上锁节点。

sentences.english: A:We put tokens in this slot and push the turn_stile,right?
sentences.chinese: 我们将代币投入这个孔，然后推这个十字转门，对吗？

sentences.english: I want to ask them if they don't remember…a moment face to face in some revolving door?
sentences.chinese: 我想问他们是否记得，在旋转门面对面那一刹。

sentences.english: Chuck Norris can slam a revolving door.
sentences.chinese: 罗礼士能够关上一扇旋转门。

definition: variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate
Qianmen subway station on Beijing Subway Line 2
front door/main entrance/honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)
